author: bionicwoman.008
title: Storytelling using Mighty Cardano
description: Cardano and blockchain in general are complicated concepts to comprehend for regular people. Same is true here in East Asia.

f6_assessments.q0: Storytellers are the most powerful people in this world, in fact, the reality we live in has been shaped by the stories told in the past. With this in mind, using a story to reach people with information about the Blockchain revolution together with Cardano is an excellent idea.
f6_assessments.q1: Pinky Manzano is an extraordinary person, which can be seen very clearly in the expression of her art. She has very clear ideas and knows how to share them through her art. I have no doubt that she will be successful once again, as she has been so many times before.
f6_assessments.q2:
The progress and completion of the project will be perfectly auditable, since the tasks are perfectly segmented with partial achievements.
Despite considering that art and rigid schedules (Gantt) are not the best of friends, the professionalism with which the proposal was created speaks for itself of Pinky Manzano's commitment.

f6_assessments.q0: I have always been deeply impressed with stories. Storytelling using Mighty Cardano is a very interesting proposition that I am aware of. I believe that using stories to convey knowledge is a very interesting thing. It does not get boring and helps the recipient of the information more excited. The Philippines is a very populous community of over 112 million people. Moreover, this is also a country where people's interest in Blockchain is huge. The successful proposal will help Cardano reach out more to this community, thereby helping Cardano lay a stronger foundation in Southeast Asia.
f6_assessments.q1: Pinky Manzano is a person who has very good writing skills and has a lot of experience in this field. I have full confidence that you will do well with this recommendation. This is a proposal that depends a lot on your creativity so I think the risk of the project will be on you personally. I think you are also aware of this so there is a good way to deal with it in case it happens.
f6_assessments.q2: The roadmap of your project is also very clear. I believe that with 13 weeks you can completely complete the timeline and work you have given. The use of the $4950 budget I see you give is also very clear and transparent. This I appreciate very much.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal addresses the challenge.The idea of introducing CARDANO through storytelling is really great, using simple language to easily tell complex things to people of all ages, it's the most creative idea I've seen so far, and the IMPACT and repercussions it can cause must be great. As a teacher myself, I understand the importance of storytelling and how teaching through stories is a great strategy, and I'm sure it will work very well.
f6_assessments.q1: Acoording to her experience, she is fully qualified to do this job with his complete personal experience and qualifications. Therefore, I believe this storytelling project is highly feasible and I am very optimistic about this amazing project.
f6_assessments.q2: It is completely auditable through their 8 storyboards, creation of Mighty Cardano Website, Creation of Mighty Cardano social media accounts and number of visits , etc.

f6_assessments.q0:
This proposal effectively addresses the challenge and has the potential for creating considerable impact by making blockchain education easy, entertaining and fun.
I think the impact could have been exponentially increased by having a small marketing budget for advertising on socials and Google. 
Personal Note: I did enjoy the little story to start off the proposal.
f6_assessments.q1: Given the experience of Pinky Manzano in branding, design, art, and storytelling, I do think she has the skills required to implement the proposal successfully. The proposal milestones are clear and implementation is straightforward.
f6_assessments.q2:
Based on the information provided, audibility is based on completed storyboards, socials created, website and engagement metrics on these platforms. This makes the process of auditing straightforward as well.
To add to that the Gnatt chart with weekly status tracking breaks down the auditing process on a weekly basis. Based on this information, I do think the proposal can be rated highly for audibility.

f6_assessments.q0: The petitioner wants to reach the Philippines on the basis of a character (Mighty Cardano). This character must then represent a fictitious cardano. This project will mainly be shared on social media. The target group for this project is the Philippines because these people spend the most hours a day on social media. I think this comes across as childish to people who work professionally with cardano. By having the character speak in English, a large part of the target group will not understand the information. The project would have a greater impact if translators were hired directly to translate the information into the major languages in Asia. It is assumed that there are no risks to successfully deliver the project. There is nothing in it that the project may be carried out in these areas. There may be local authorities against the project.
f6_assessments.q1: Pinky Manzano is the only team member who will be working on the project. I think it would be useful to hire some translators to translate the project into other languages. Pinkey has relevant experience. (account management, marketing, written a book) I think Pinkey lacks the educational skills to make a useful character. A timeline has been included in which it is stated per week what needs to be done. I think it will be difficult to build a decent website in 2 weeks. There is a clear budget overview that states what the costs are to complete this project. I think a budget of $4950 is very tight. Risks such as the language barrier have not been taken into account enough. It is also assumed that enough advertising can be made via social media. It would be useful to involve schools in the project to see if the content is understandable.
f6_assessments.q2: The milestones are included in the proposal. These milestones should be more widely known. There is a checklist included. I would like to know what is in this checklist. The social media statistics should also be clearly displayed on the website in order to monitor the project. The proposal mainly states what everything should look like, but does not include the problem statement. It would be useful to know who actually does something with the information. By introducing Mighty Cardano, it is possible to provide content about Cardano to people from the Philippines in a simple way. The goal of making people aware about cardano can certainly succeed.

f6_assessments.q0: This is a novel proposal that I like, because "we all love stories" and it is true that it can generate wider acceptance and interest of people reading short stories and comics in social media, sharing with them adapted knowledge about Cardano that is not usually easy to understand for common people.
f6_assessments.q1: Pinky is an illustrator who has already published a book, who also has experience in digital marketing. With a timeline and budgets that are clearly detailed, it makes you think that she is already editing and drawing Mighy Cardano!
f6_assessments.q2: It would be highly verifiable the progress of her work from week 5, at least 1 story per week will be uploaded on social media and a Mighty Cardano website will also be created.

f6_assessments.q0:
The proposer identify a problem about regular people understanding the Cardano and blockchain in general by storytelling using a character named "Mighty Cardano". This storytelling (short stories and comic strips) approach not something new within the Cardano Ecosystem, I believe we've seen several comics/art projects are trying to do the same for the past year in the community and not succeeded. It would be interesting to see another approach from this proposal, but creating a new character, storylines, would be challenging.

The proposer did mention there are similar proposals using the same approach, and as a CA I would recommend collaborating instead of creating their own characters and telling the same story.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer gives a detailed plan and timeline within 4 months to deliver the output which is reasonable, with enough experience.  Although a low budget is requested, this proposal is at risk to compete with other similar proposals and having a low impact within the East Asia community. The proposer idea to start locally first is a good approach, with a dense population in PH, and the popularity of Axie Infinity and other NFT projects, as a CA aI would like to see the proposer collaborating with other Cardano artists, especially within the Philipinnes and grow from there.
f6_assessments.q2:
To monitor project milestones after funding on each individual proposal website might just be too much to ask, I would suggest the proposer create a simple thread in Cardano Forum or GitHub, and these can be linked later by the Challenge leaders.

As for the targeted delivery; I would suggest improving as below :
1. Creation of Character - achieve a good feedback minimum of xx % in Twitter poll (example) or another platform of choice
2. The website gets a minimum of xxx visits within 3 months of launch or growing visitors
3. The social media accounts (Twitter?) followers growth of xx % per month
4. The metrics of engagement should be qualitative also to easily track the achievement.
5. Number of Cardano Community using the MC character in their personal sites (either growth or a number)

solution: Give Cardano a relatable and entertaining persona and roll out an educational and informative campaign through a character Mighty Cardano.
experience: I am a skilled professional marketer, with management experience in brand marketing, brand strategy & product design for reputable fashion brands like Esprit, Police, Giordano, Chronofixe, Blackwell. I am a born artist (fine arts degree), an illustrator, and a book author.
